Structs/RequiredStrategy.html#/s:11Submi.name: IsRequired
Structs/RequiredStrategy.html#/s:11Submi.abstract: Determines whether a field is required given a validation context.

Structs/RequiredStrategy.html#/s:11Submi.name: onCreate
Structs/RequiredStrategy.html#/s:11Submi.abstract: Field is required only when creating a new entity.

Structs/RequiredStrategy.html#/s:11Submi.name: onUpdate
Structs/RequiredStrategy.html#/s:11Submi.abstract: Field is required only when updating an existing entity.

Structs/RequiredStrategy.html#/s:11Submi.name: onCreateOrUpdate
Structs/RequiredStrategy.html#/s:11Submi.abstract: Field is required both when creating as well as when updating an entity.

Structs/Field.html#/s:11Submissions5Fiel.name: value
Structs/Field.html#/s:11Submissions5Fiel.abstract: The value for this field represented as a String.

Structs/Field.html#/s:11Submissions5Fiel.name: label
Structs/Field.html#/s:11Submissions5Fiel.abstract: A label describing this field. Used by Tags to render alongside an input field.

Structs/Field.html#/s:11Submissions5Fiel.name: isRequired
Structs/Field.html#/s:11Submissions5Fiel.abstract: Whether or not values are allowed to be absent.

Structs/SubmissionValidationError.html.name: SubmissionValidationError
Structs/SubmissionValidationError.html.abstract: An error signaling that validation failed. Info about the error(s) is stored in the FieldCache.

Structs/Field.html.name: Field
Structs/Field.html.abstract: Wraps a (string representation of a) value including validation metadata. Can be validated.

Structs/RequiredStrategy.html.name: RequiredStrategy
Structs/RequiredStrategy.html.abstract: A way to determine whether a field is required given a validation context.

Structs/TagTemplatePaths.html.name: TagTemplatePaths
Structs/TagTemplatePaths.html.abstract: Configuration for template paths used when rendering tags.

Protocols/Submittable.html.name: Submittable

Enums/AbsentValueStrategy.html.abstract: Determine which values count as an absent value besides nil.

Enums/ValidationContext.html.abstract: Introduces a context to the validation process. It is used together with RequiredStrategy to

Classes/FieldCache.html#/s:11Submissions.abstract: Validates the values in the field cache.

Classes/FieldCache.html.name: FieldCache
Classes/FieldCache.html.abstract: A FieldCache contains the data used by Tags to produce the fields in HTML forms.

Classes/SubmissionsMiddleware.html.name: SubmissionsMiddleware
Classes/SubmissionsMiddleware.html.abstract: Middleware that intercepts and SubmissionValidationErrors and renders them as Responses.

Classes/FileTag.html.name: FileTag
Classes/FileTag.html.abstract: A tag that renders a template file corresponding to a file input element.
